attributes.action: To Lower the age of consent for sexual intercourse to 14
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Primeininster To Lower the age of consent for sexual intercourse to 14 were both paersons are under the age of 18 and the age of consent for Sexual Intercaourse where any person involved is aged 18 or over will remain 16

rejection.details: You may resubmit your petition with a revised title:  "Lower the age of consent to 14 where both persons are under the age of 16."
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
